channel.title: Almond Syrup :: Recipe Book
channel.description: Ingredients Ingredient Â½ Batch 1 Batch Water 100g 200g Sugar 80g 160g Almond Extract 1/2 tsp 1 tsp Preparation In a small saucepan, combine water and sugar. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, stirring until sugar is fully dissolved. Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Stir in almond extract. Allow to cool completely before using. Store in a sealed container in the refrigerator.
